name: Marmor
content:
Marmor was a Human male who hailed from the planet Corellia and lived during the Galactic Civil War. He served in the Galactic Empire but eventually defected to the Alliance to Restore the Republic along with Imperial Army storm commando leader—and later Rebel general—Crix Madine. By the year 4 ABY, Marmor held the rank of corporal in the Alliance, and he worked as a dock mechanic aboard the MC80 Home One type Star Cruiser Home One. During his service aboard Home One, Marmor managed a staff of seventy-five starfighter and twelve Star Cruiser mechanics in the rear quadrant of the Cruiser. He had fair skin and dark hair.
Marmor was introduced in a card for the 2000 Death Star II Limited expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Star Wars Customizable Card Game, simultaneously also being mentioned as a gameplay statistic on the card for another character, Lieutenant s'Too Vees, released in the same set.
